sentences.sContent: At least for Russia, that it is.
sentences.sContent_eng: At least for Russia, that it is.
sentences.sCn: 至少对于俄罗斯是这样的。

sentences.sContent: Our goal continues to be to send a clear message to Russia, or others, not to do this to us.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our goal continues to be to send a clear message to Russia, or others, not to do this to us.
sentences.sCn: 我们的目标是向俄罗斯或其他人发出一个明确的信息，即不要对我们做这样的事。
